title: Alien & Aliens Theatrical Release [HDTV.720p.XviD.Avi]
description:
Aliens: www.imdb.com/title/tt0090605/

Alien: www.imdb.com/title/tt0078748/Ã¢â‚¬Å½

At my speed it will take a few days to get these up, but I think it is worth it to have these *extreme* quality movies available in XviD/Avi format with mp3 audio. That is the most compatible combination for DVD players.

I don't know if these versions (which are essentially perfect) are available in the above format. These were converted from mkv files and, unfortunately, I have no utility to convert .mka (audio) to AC3, so there's no Dolby but the audio quality is very high at about 300 Kbps 2-channel stereo.

I've deleted the mkv files to make space on my hard drive and unfortunately forgot to demux the .mka audio streams and include them here (for those of you that DO have a utility to make the conversion).

Here's the file details (also included)
